code: import{ADD_TO_MY_BOOKMARK,ADD_NEW_BOOKMARK,REMOVE_BOOKMARK,REMOVE_FROM_MY_BOOKMARK,UPDATE_BOOKMARK,UPDATE_MY_BOOKMARK}from'../actionTypes';export var mybookmark=function mybookmark(mybookmarkdata){return{type:ADD_TO_MY_BOOKMARK,payload:{mybookmarkdata:mybookmarkdata}};};export var newbookmark=function newbookmark(bookmarkdata,image_url){return{type:ADD_NEW_BOOKMARK,payload:{bookmarkdata:bookmarkdata,image_url:image_url}};};export var updatebookmark=function updatebookmark(id,updatedata,image_url){return{type:UPDATE_BOOKMARK,payload:{id:id,updatedata:updatedata,image_url:image_url}};};export var updateMybookmark=function updateMybookmark(id,updateMydata,image_url){return{type:UPDATE_MY_BOOKMARK,payload:{id:id,updateMydata:updateMydata,image_url:image_url}};};export var removebookmark=function removebookmark(removeid){return{type:REMOVE_BOOKMARK,removeid:removeid};};export var removemybookmark=function removemybookmark(bookmarkid){return{type:REMOVE_FROM_MY_BOOKMARK,bookmarkid:bookmarkid};};
